name: drunken granny scarf
notes:
**drunken granny easy crochet scarf pattern**

looking for a quick, beginner-friendly project with a touch of elegance? the **drunken granny easy crochet scarf** is the perfect pattern for you! this simple yet stunning scarf works up fast with a relaxing one-row repeat pattern, making it ideal for crafters of all skill levels.

using basic double crochet stitches, this design creates a textured look that’s both stylish and cozy. the pattern is fully customizable – adjust the width and length to suit your preferences or use up your yarn stash for a variety of unique creations.

this downloadable pdf includes step-by-step instructions, helpful tips, and suggestions on how to add a polished border to your scarf. perfect for last-minute gifts, craft fair items, or just a satisfying day of crocheting!

**details**:
 * skill level: beginner
 * yarn weight: dk (3)
 * hook size: 6mm (or any size suitable for your yarn)
 * pattern includes: full instructions + customization guide

get ready to create a versatile, beautiful scarf you'll love to wear or share!

✅ free pattern   https://bit.ly/3qd8slv 
✅ printable pdf pattern   https://bit.ly/45l39ze 
✅ right handed tutorial  https://youtu.be/3j8tiwt_bk8  
✅ left handed tutorial   https://youtu.be/mxegwqrf2rg
